explains: n. 强烈的欲望，冲动；被迫的状态；强迫力，强制力；（法律等的）义务

sentences.en: You are under no compulsion to pay immediately.
sentences.cn: 没有人强迫你立刻付款。

sentences.en: She seemed dead with fear—yes, she was under his compulsion.
sentences.cn: 她似乎吓得要死——是的，她在他的强迫之下。

sentences.en: She shunned bodily ornamentation and strove to use only the natural movements of her body, undistorted by acrobatic exaggeration and stimulated only by internal compulsion.
sentences.cn: 她避开身体上的装饰，努力只使用身体的自然动作，不被杂技般的夸张所扭曲，只被内心的强迫所刺激。
